awd_titl_txt: Tomographic Inversion of Seismic Data in Three Dimensional  Anisotropic Media
awd_abstract_narration: This proposal seeks funding to develop seismic tomography                  software for three dimensional anisotropic media.  The software                 will be used in geophysical and geotechnical applications.  It                  would incorporate a method of estimating uncertainties that is                  based on quantifying the effect of a fixed number of random                     perturbations of observations on the solution.  The software                    would be tested using seismic data obtained from small scale                    isotropic and anisotropic models constructed in the laboratory.                 The proposed study represents a new direction of research for the               principal investigator that should lead to more interdisciplinary               studies with colleagues in computer science and civil                           engineering.
